import React from 'react'; const LifecycleView = ({ stateCounts }) => { return (

Ciclo de Vida de Procesos

{stateCounts.new}
NUEVO
{stateCounts.ready}
LISTO
{stateCounts.running}
EJEC
{stateCounts.waiting}
ESPERA
{stateCounts.terminated}
TERM
); }; export default LifecycleView;
